sentences.en: Another benefit is that learning software can utilise all three learning techniques of hearing, seeing and doing which greatly reinforces acquisition.
sentences.cn: 另一个好处是，学习软件可以利用看、听、做三种学习方式，加强学生对知识的理解和掌握。

sentences.en: En chinois on utilise la mule ou l'ane.
Future models will utilise Jaguar's green'hybrid'technology now under development.
sentences.cn: 今后的型号将采用捷豹绿色'杂交'的技术目前正在开发的.

sentences.en: In more conventional use, the Silent Sounds Subliminal System might utilise voice commands, e . g.
sentences.cn: 在更?j常的用法里, 沉默声音潜意识系统可以利用声音的命令, 例如,作为安全系统的配置.

sentences.en: The one thing that never crosses the minds of our elite is to utilise local talent, local enterprise, local money to build Pakistan.
sentences.cn: 有一件事从来没有穿过我们精英的头脑，那就是利用本地人才，本地企业，本地资金来建设巴基斯坦。

sentences.en: Utilise group resources in the achievement of operating unit goals.
sentences.cn: 利用团体资源达成运营单位的目标.
